Reviews.Title: Good cheap TV
Reviews.Author: Mike Batch
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a decent TV for the money. I bought it to replace the 13 inch tube TV in my kitchen and it fills that need nicely. The picture could be brighter and the colors crisper compared to more expensive LED LCD TVs. But for less than $90 it's hard to beat for a TV primarily used to watch basic programming while cooking. The speakers aren't great, but again, not a deal breaker.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: E.G.
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a second monitor/bedroom TV. It functions well, is easy to setup and has a nice picture. If you're looking for ultra clear hi-def you should probably spend a little more and get something 1080p capable. This wasn't an issue for me as I'll really be using this to watch the news while I get ready for work. I took away one star because I feel it should have 2 HDMI ports instead of one but I took care of that by using the VGA slot for my computer input and the HDMI for the cable box. As a monitor you can also use the TV's speakers for computer speakers which allows you to control the volume using the remote if you are streaming movies or shows. Overall good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: a good tv if you can get it for less than 100
Reviews.Author: Gregory Paulino "GPA"
Reviews.Content: I bought it just because the price dropped to $85, seems a bit small for a 22" tv but so far it has solved my need of a tv in the ktchen.

Reviews.Title: Works Good!
Reviews.Author: dca74
Reviews.Content: Picture and all Plug-inns work fine, Just is not on Time-Warner-Cable's remote list. VCR, Hook-up, Computer Hook-up,HDMI Hook-up, all are fine.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this TV if you plan on using the "digital tuner"
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Despite this being an HDTV, it does not have a QAM tuner so you will not get digital channels..only analog. You will only get your locals such as 6, 8, 10, 13, etc instead of the digital channels such as 55.5, 52.13, etc that has ESPN, AMC, Travel, etc. It's essentially a glorified monitor.

Reviews.Title: A new TV that doesn't have a tuner that will process digital cable signals!
Reviews.Author: Gebman
Reviews.Content: I received this TV in less that 36 hours after I ordered it, fantastic service.  However when I scanned the cable channels (several times) during set up it only recognized 19 out of the 100+ channels my cable service provides.I called Seiki's hot line and was told this TV is working fine since it is receiving some channels, the problem is that it does not have a tuner that will process digital signals.  To receive those channels it would require an external QAM tuner or digital adapter box to process digital broadcasts, which, of course, I would be required to purchase.  I guess by omitting the digital tuner it allows Seiki to sell these TVs so cheap.It has been nearly 5 years since the government mandated that all TV signals had to be broadcast in digital format.  How can a manufacturer produce a TV now days that does not meet five year old FCC standards?  Unbelievable!!I called Amazon and they agreed to allow me to return the TV.  Can't beat Amazon for customer service.

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: don woods
Reviews.Content: we use it as a monitor in the bed room works good picture is good sound is a little weak over all would recomend for monitor have not hooked up to cable to say how it works as a tv..

Reviews.Title: Sent It Back
Reviews.Author: Orene Harris
Reviews.Content: We ordered this television to use with an antenna at our work office; not cable.  It would only get UHF channels.  We called tech support and they were wonderful.  They even called the Seiki dealer.  No one could figure out the problem.  It worked great when we took it home and hooked it up to cable; but, when we tried it on an antenna there, it would only get UHF channels.  So, I sent it back and ordered another television.  If you want a television to just use on cable, it would be great and very inexpensive.

Reviews.Title: Well Pleased
Reviews.Author: Valerie Stephens
Reviews.Content: Very good price... Light weight... Easy to connect to direct tv. Once TV is connected to cable service wire, press SOURCE button the press first option that appears(comp) or hdmi. That should get you viewing your Chanels

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Tanya Silpot
Reviews.Content: I purchase this TV for my 7 year old daughter and it's a decent size and plus the price was great. The TV shows clear.  Overall I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: James Roberts
Reviews.Content: Nice tv.Good picture quality for the priceBut the sound quality could be alot better, otherwise very good tv for theoney

Reviews.Title: a good buy
Reviews.Author: George Maddux
Reviews.Content: it is great i use it everyday ...i will recommend it to any one that may be interested in purchasing your Seiki Digital

Reviews.Title: Not bad if you looking directly at it
Reviews.Author: DAVID CACCAVALLA
Reviews.Content: This product was ok. We wanted to use the TV in are home office so it about a foot above me. Looking up its hard to see the screen. I purchased this TV because it had more DVMI ports then my TV, but ended up' putting my old TV back in and using this in another room where they are viewing it on the same level.

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: odie's friend
Reviews.Content: i love my new tv, i did not know if i would like the new flat screen tvs available, well my little seki put that to rest. it is just the right size for my bedroom and the picture quality is great,

Reviews.Title: Video Good, Audio Okay
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: The video is about average of what you would get from a REGULAR TV, like a 90s tv. But, video is video, so I'm good with that. The audio DOES NOT go very high, so this is a good tv for a bedroom or any house with no children or pets because the volume will not go louder than THAT noise :) It is small, so it is also good for children's rooms because it is cheap, expendable and doesn't get very loud so they could have it all the way up and you might barely hear it from the next room. I think it is a good buy for a tight budget, but definetly not something you want for any mean of family entertainment.

Reviews.Title: i paid $75+ $20 for ext. warranty.  i'm satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Cardwell
Reviews.Content: PQ is good, nothing to write home about.  If you'te planning on using this w/ an antenna, you may need to pay a little more for a good+ quality one.  There's 6 local stations.  This Tv picked up only 1 until I connected a digital/analog converter box and it still only picks up 3 stations, VERY poorly during times of rain...I have a Sony Dvd player, not upscaling, may have more enthusiasm if / when I buy a blu ray player.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bryan R. Bergman
Reviews.Content: This little tv is not going to win any awards for picture quality, but at its low price you wouldn't expect it to. Don't get me wrong, it has a good picture, its just not a primary tv. It does work and display images in a satisfactory manner. I use it in my workshop as both a tv and computer monitor. For what it cost, its a good tv.

Reviews.Title: Good price, picture and reception.  No guide. Terrible speakers.
Reviews.Author: ADRIAN
Reviews.Content: At first glance, at was impressed by all the channels that came in, and they were pretty sharp for 720p.  I went to see "what was on", and to my disappointment could not find a TV guide. There is only a channel listing.  Then I went to turn it up, and the sound is pathetic.  This alone made me wish I spent a few more bucks for a TV with a decent speaker.. it's really really bad sound, very "tinny".  I have a 17" Philips LCD that sounds awesome in comparison.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't 22" was a 20"
Reviews.Author: Russel
Reviews.Content: Price was okay however the T.V itself wasn't a 22" it was a 20"s but for 80$ I guess I could live with it.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Leanna Mellon
Reviews.Content: Picture is good, bright, colorful responsive.  The  audio is not great, sounds tinny even when using HDMI cables. Great for under $100

Reviews.Title: Not HD ready
Reviews.Author: Scott Bruning
Reviews.Content: It is definitely miss advertised. This is not an HD ready tv and needs a box of some form to get cable channels. Other than that, it works fine.

Reviews.Title: Had pixel dots on it.
Reviews.Author: Jor El
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these by accident.  Both had a single bright dot that does not go away, a pixel that went arwry.  It is very distracting.  But for the price, I kept it.  My 8 year old daughter does not seem to mind (yet.)

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Terri Campbell
Reviews.Content: Had an old 19in tube that is history.  Saw this TV....loveit.  Very nice quality, picture and would highly recommendit for a bedroom, office etc.  The only concern is howsmall print the remote is.  No worries though...well worththe deal!  Easy to put stand on as well.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: missy
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my neice, she loves it and color is really good. games work really good too.  BF

Reviews.Title: Happy with my  new tv
Reviews.Author: Linda M. Laplac "Linda Marie"
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this Tv  we have it in are sun room .the pic is vera good would get it  if I needy a new tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: vippydoda
Reviews.Content: Worth every penny and more.  I cannot say anything negative.  Set up was easy as was connecting it to my satellite system.

Reviews.Title: Not really a TV - More of a computer monitor
Reviews.Author: P. Doret
Reviews.Content: This unit does not have a QAM tuner and will not work with a digital cable system.  It was returned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV on a Saturday night with standard shipping and got it Monday night! The TV works great I got it for my kids play room and the picture and  the all around quality is great. Nice TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lou
Reviews.Content: This a very good tv for the price, I use this one to replace a 19" older model tv. Just plug it and enjoy. The price is good  for this 22" flat screen. May get a 24" next time I decide to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: Good Budget TV
Reviews.Author: Shopping Diva "Vernell M"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv as a replacement for the 15 inch tv I had in my kitchen.  This is the perfect size for a kitchen.  The picture is very bright and clear and it has good reception.  I can actually see what color clothes the people are wearing.  The sound could be improved by adding speakers.  My son  thinks it is a great improvement over the old tv.  We both now enjoy watching tv while cooking and eating.I  am happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the cheap price!
Reviews.Author: Japan NYT
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase. I like this product. Much Much nicer than I expected.screen/image quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: leo
Reviews.Content: I use mine only for watching netflix on my ps3 on the side while I play my other ps3 on my larger one it's alright but the sound is kinda low like it seems when you go from 20-40 or 50 it sounds the same either away it's an alright tv for side purposes

Reviews.Title: Seiki Digital SC22HY07 22 inch LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jewell Payton
Reviews.Content: I bought the Seiki Digital SC22HY07 22 inch LCD HDTV on 18 January 2014 with a Square Trade two year warranty.  At first I loved this TV and recommended it to all my co-workers and friends.  It arrived on schedule and it was very easy to set up and the picture and sound was excellent.  It is less than six months later and this TV will not turn on at all. I can't return this item so I tried to use my warranty.  I was informed by a Square Trade representative that I had to use the manufacturer's warranty first.  So I contacted the manufacturer and I was told my request will be reviewed by their support representative and a response will be sent shortly.  No other response has been received.  This sucks.  With the experience that I have had with this item I cannot in good conscience recommend that anyone buy from this manufacture.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous basic tv!
Reviews.Author: SabrinaCalfee
Reviews.Content: This tv is absolutely exactly what I was looking for. I just needed a tv for my kitchen and was actually looking for a 15 inch so I could keep the cost down. When I saw this 22 inch tv for $75.00, I was completely excited! With prime shipping, it came very quickly and I set it up in less than fifteen minutes. It works great and the sound is loud enough for me to hear it over the dishwasher and running water, etc. If you are looking for a tv to watch movies on or hook a surround sound system to, then this isn't your tv. But if you just want a simple tv to hook up to cable for casual watching, then by all means order this one because it is a great product for the price. Way to go Amazon!

Reviews.Title: just awesome
Reviews.Author: Patrick R Charles
Reviews.Content: This was awesome. It got here fast and works great. I had to replace one that had to be sent in for repairs and it arrived fast and works great. I use it for my sons games so it is mounted on the wall and never gets moved. great price and speed to get here.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Thomas Palmer
Reviews.Content: The sound on tv is really bad, but you can add external speakers and a hdmi cable and its ok.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Joniecat
Reviews.Content: The TV works well and the only thing that bothers me is the sound.  It sounds a little tinny.  I also wish they had posted the dimensions  including the stand and not just the unit.  It really doesn't fit in my kitchen where I wanted it.

Reviews.Title: Sound Problem
Reviews.Author: pisces2404
Reviews.Content: I gave it this rating because I had to send the first one I got back because there was a problem with the sound coming from the speakers.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: E. Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a good price to use as a guest room TV. I only have an antenna and it works fine. It was easy to set up and has a great picture. I love it.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Randy Meyer
Reviews.Content: Works ok. Little smaller than expected. Doesn't pick up all digital channels, other than that pretty satisfied especially for price.

Reviews.Title: Does the job!
Reviews.Author: Jeffery L. Wynne
Reviews.Content: Good little bedroom TV. Nice picture, plenty of connections available and a great price. Sound is the only weakness of this unit but, its not that bad. So far so good!

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Hilo Haole "Atari 2600 Veteran"
Reviews.Content: Not much to say since our unit arrived DOA. Other reviews say this TV has no digital tuner (doesn't that make it a monitor?) so we returned it and bought a 24" LG for $129 that actually works.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. McManus
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for the guest room and it is perfect!  Picture and sound are great.  Like the side option to connect DVD player.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Bedroom
Reviews.Author: F. Barone
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV when it was $85, and for that price it is well worth the money. Anything North of $140 is when I would start checking out other options. When it first arrived, i unpackaged it, set it up, and noticed a dead pixel smack in the middle of the screen. Called Amazon, they next day shipped a replacement and arranged for me to take the return to the UPS store; Amazon quickly and pleasantly saved this from being a very regretful purchase.Picture: 7.5/10It's 720P so I wasn't expecting much, but the picture is extremely crisp for the price of the TV. Only serious videophiles or those looking to use this with blu-ray will have any complaints.Sound: 7/10Regardless of what other reviews say, the sound is not THAT bad. I'd say its comparable to an abnormally loud ipad, in terms of the dynamics/range.If i was in the market for a cheap bedroom or kitchen TV, I would buy this again from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Price is right for TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Harris
Reviews.Content: I received this TV today, set it up in about 30 minutes, tho others complained about the sound, mine was loud and good for small speakers, the picture is bright and sharp ...for the price its really hard to beat this little 22" TV, we are most pleased with all aspects of it.It serves our purpose in computer room.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Robert J Schulz
Reviews.Content: I read several reviews about this TV not having a digital tuner. I paid $86 for this tv. I can't really complain. If you paid what I paidd, what are you complaining about? I bought it for my guest room to replace an older style tv. The picture is good but it could be a little crisper. The audio is not great, it sounds a bit tinny to me, but it is adequate and clear. For what I paid for this TV I am very happy with what I got. I got what I paid for, a cheap tv for use in my guest room. If they don't like the sound or the picture, there's a hotel down the street.

Reviews.Title: No digital channels from cable!
Reviews.Author: S. Appleby "Artist"
Reviews.Content: If you have Cable TV please be aware that it will only display standard cable channels and not any of the digital channels. If you want to enjoy 720P with this television, you will have to use other options to do so.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: bsrlee72
Reviews.Content: Picture looks good, the sound is decent the price is right. I recommend this unit to anyone that wants to save a buck.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good!
Reviews.Author: Mama of 4
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace a 20 inch tube tv that was on the fritz. It's for my young daughter's room and I felt the size was perfect...even better than I expected. So far the tv has held up just fine, we've had no issues with it. It was very simple to hook up and I had zero problems figuring anything out with what went where. Very happy with my purchase thus far.

Reviews.Title: review seiki 22 inch tv
Reviews.Author: rosekonitsky
Reviews.Content: I got one from sears for 99.00 and this one was 57.00 what a  great deal my husband said he loves the picture just wish it was a little larger

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV AT A GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: jammey schick
Reviews.Content: ORDERED AND RECEIVED TV IN 2 DAYS, HAS GREAT PICTURE AND SOUND. PERFECT FOR BEDROOM, OFFICE, OR ANY ROOM. WILL BE GETTING ME A COUPLE MORE FOR THE HOUSE THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: RK
Reviews.Content: We got it to replace a kitchen set which had died. It serves that purpose well. It was the best value at $90. Sound could be better. Picture quality is good. Would not use it for a home theater but in the kitchen it's fine.

Reviews.Title: I DONT RECOMEND THIS TV
Reviews.Author: sherri grigsby
Reviews.Content: SHOULD BE FALSE AVERTIZING ITS SAYS ITS A DIGITAL LCD HDTV BUT IT DONT HAVE A DIGITAL TUNER DOES NOT PICK UP LOCAL DIGITAL PROGRAMING  JUST ANALOG CABLE TV  I WOULD RETURN IT BUT IT BE A HASSLE

Reviews.Title: I have NEVER experienced WORSE customer service in my life
Reviews.Author: Paul DeLucia
Reviews.Content: Ordered a Seiki product and after 9 months, the audio/visual ports stopped working. We contacted the company and after talking to a tech support rep, we instructed to ship it back to them (at our own expense) and they would ship us a new one because our malfunctioning unit was still under their "great" 1 year warranty.We shipped it to their location in Mississippi (at a personal cost of $120) We were initially instructed to email the tracking number to the rep we had originally spoken with to speed up the process of them shipping us the new one. We shipped out the originally TV on Nov. 20th.  We never received any confirmation that they had received the number or later the product until we called 2 weeks later. After being on hold for 30+min on several occasions (most times we were sent to voice-mail) we were told everything was in line to ship and to expect our new TV within 7-14 business days. After two more weeks, we called back. still no TV. we were told that they no longer made our model and we would have to wait until a refurbished model was available. Already having waited a month for this replacement, we refused to accept this and finally got a supervisor to approve an upgrade to the next size up. We have since been waiting for the replacement, approaching two months now. Every time we have called, we are told its waiting to be shipped or they are backed up and it will take up to 5 weeks to ship or their warehouse is out of stock. Every time a new story. We are out several hundred dollars between the initial purchase of this TV along with shipping it back. I would NEVER recommend anyone purchase anything from Seiki, they are incompetence and disregard for their customers incarnate.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work.....you get what you pay for CHEAP!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carrie
Reviews.Content: First I paid a extra 15.99 for next day devilery. I'm a prime customer so two day delivery is free but it came after 2 days not one. Secondly I purchased this as a gift for my husband. He is underway at the moment and I bought it for his rack so he could watch movies. He puts it in his rack turns it on...nothing just a red light across the screen. I would never buy this item again. Money wasted...

Reviews.Title: five stars for that seiki tv
Reviews.Author: Andjelko
Reviews.Content: this television is wery, wery good,pictures,brightnes,schrapnes, colour is exelant,on back hi haz more stuff for conect,vga,hdmi,a/v 3xrca,usb,digital audio and audio 3,5 mm conect laptop with tv.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: B.  Bergman
Reviews.Content: Half the hardware is missing..can't use stand..No wires..have to find/ buy accessories just to turn on tv...not worth it if it is not complete

ProductInfo.Features:
Thin LCD Design: TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 20.63-Inch x 13.62-Inch x 3.05-Inch, TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 20.63-Inch x 15.2-Inch x 7.87-Inch
800:1 Contrast Ratio
One year replacement policy
ProductInfo.Name: Seiki SC22HY07 22.0-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV
